tweet: Warning: do not use Monero Ledger HW app with latest Monero client v0.14. Support issues have been reported on it, we are investigating. See more here  https://t.co/yOV2b09QaG
Ledger devs warn users not to use the Monero app after user reportedly loses 1,680 XMR   https://t.co/EdtMgY2tYo  https://t.co/QXKH9ocUSe
A Monero bug enabling exchange hacks has been discovered and disclosed by the Ryo cryptocurrency team  https://t.co/OhqkNn4QCD

Apparently some bug has been found related to the latest Monero version (0.14) and Ledger.  Details still being investigated, but seems like spending XMR stored on a Ledger can cause massive loss of funds. If you have XMR on a Ledger, DO NOTHING, and wait   https://t.co/kv1f4UcTgQ
